item.description:
gobble or wobble (cos of all the food 2 days before) on over, 6.30pm, order pizza and have some snacks beer, booze, pop (soda, whatever), and Euchre. AND if anyone wants to bring along any other board game, in case we end up with an odd number people (all euchre members are odd though, except me of course), then please do!
Hope to see you all, new and old, bring your beverage please.

tootles, and enjoy your Thanksgiving day!!

group.name: The North of Boston Euchre Meetup

item.name: still digesting the turkey meet-up, late Nov
